description:
This is the best app I have ever used to track medication (on any operating system). It has every feature one would think of, all while being beautiful to look at.

Props to the developer!
Convenient and simple. There are a few things I'd change or add, but they aren't critical. It just works and doesn't fail.

Just what I've been looking for, a comprehensive medication management software that doesn't feed my health history to a private company. Does what I need it to do, perhaps could be better with injectable medications, but I'm still happy giving the app a 5 stars just because of how simple and useful it is.

Hopefully it has a backup and restore function at some point.

summary: Helps me keep up with my schizo medication

description: I really like it, very clean, but there should be a way to run the program in the background and on startup, so I don't miss notifications.
summary: nice but one thing is missing

description: This is a highly polished and functional app for the management of drugs. Extraordinalily easy to use and really nice with the implementation of Libadwaita. The only UX issue I have is that I wish medicine taken as-needed was as convienent to log as daily meds. At the moment, you have to enter a menu and clicka drop down menu, but I wish I could just log it though the same checkbox system that timed medication uses. Thank you developer!
summary: Really helping me manage my medications
